CompleteAccount.body:
{{{name}}}, it's Seasons. You're in. You'll soon have access to hundreds of new styles without the stress of commitment.

To finish setting up your membership, login at {{{webChoosePlanLink}}}, then select a plan. 

Due to demand, your invitation will expire in 48 hours. If you have any questions please contact {{{contactEmail}}}.

TwentyFourHourLeftAuthorizationFollowup.body:
Hi {{{name}}}, it's Seasons. You have 24 hours left to secure your spot. In order to ensure all Seasons subscribers have access to maximum inventory, our membership total is currently capped. So if we don't hear from you, you'll be placed on our waitlist until another spot is available. {{{webChoosePlanLink}}}.

If you need help finding your first reservation, follow this link {{{stylistLink}}} to book some one on one time with our stylist.

Rewaitlisted.body:
{{{name}}}, it's Seasons. Your signup window has closed. Due to demand, we've had to give your spot to the next person in line.

If you'd still like to obtain a membership, please contact us at {{{contactEmail}}}.

ResumeReminder.body:
Hi {{{name}}}, it's Seasons. Your account is set to resume on {{{resumeDate}}}. 

Reply "1" to extend your pause by 1 month, "3" to extend it by 3 months, or "resume" to restart it immediately. 

If you have any questions, please contact us at {{{contactEmail}}}.
